title: Throne of Ash
description: She was the daughter her mother always wanted. Until she wasn’t.  The animals call her Great Spirit.  Her mother calls her a disappointment.  Rex calls her his soulmate.   Mira lives in a world where every day of her life is a question mark. The rich have their precious city and The Establishment to protect them, and everyone else is dead or watching their minutes tick away on the wrong side of the wall. She’s been sneaking into the city for weeks now, undetected until three princes enter her world and she learns her life has been a lie, in more ways than one.  Someone condemned her to a life on Earth with her powers locked away. Now that she’s returning to her real home, she must learn to use her powers to eliminate the darkness that is threatening everything she loves.  Throne of Ash is a full-length novel with 74,000 words. It is the first of two books.  This book contains moderate adult language and situations.
author: Lena Lee
